body_html: you can take a look at reverse_sequence to impl a kernel op yourself -- should be pretty easy. an alternative hack for this is after you run your RNN, u call reverse_sequence and then grab the first output[0].

body: you can take a look at reverse_sequence to impl a kernel op yourself -- should be pretty easy. an alternative hack for this is after you run your RNN, u call reverse_sequence and then grab the first output[0].
